sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都含有"泉"之意。
means: fountain ： 指天然或供观赏或饮水用的人工泉或喷泉。引申用根"根源"或"源泉"解。
spring ： 指从地面自然涌出的天然泉。

sentence.Network_en: Snape wrote a receipt with a gold fountain pen.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯内普用金笔开了一张收据。

sentence.Network_en: Located off-center in the irregularly shaped lake was a fountain.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这个形状不规则的湖泊的湖心以外的地方有一眼喷泉。

sentence.Network_en: You are a fountain of ideas.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in sense 2): from Old French fontaine, from late Latin fontana, feminine of Latin fontanus, adjective from fons, font- 'a spring'

entry.def: A fountain is an ornamental feature in a pool or lake which consists of a long narrow stream of water that is forced up into the air by a pump.
A fountain of a liquid is an amount of it which is sent up into the air and falls back.

example.ex: The volcano spewed a fountain of molten rock 650 feet in the air.
example.tran: 这座火山喷射出的岩浆高达650英尺。

entry.def: If you describe a person or thing as a fountain of something, you mean they are an important source of it and supply a lot of it.

example.ex: You are a fountain of ideas.

means.word_mean: 1. a structure from which an artificially produced jet of water arises
2. a natural flow of ground water
3. an artificially produced flow of water
4. a plumbing fixture that provides a flow of water

auth_sentence.content: A fountain of words scintillating with wit and humour.
auth_sentence.res_content: A fountain of words scintillating with wit and humour.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A fountain of words scintillating with wit and humour.

auth_sentence.content: He wrote with quills and a simple fountain pen.
auth_sentence.res_content: He wrote with quills and a simple fountain pen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He wrote with quills and a simple fountain pen.

auth_sentence.content: My friends, this is the fountain of youth!
auth_sentence.res_content: My friends, this is the fountain of youth!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My friends, this is the fountain of youth!

Sentence.sentence: The curtains were never drawn, even at night, so guests got a view of the lake and fountains outside which were lit up at night – a very attractive sight.

sentences.en: The fountain plays only at weekend.
sentences.cn: 这个喷泉仅在周末喷水。

means.word_mean: 来源, 根源, 源泉

sentences.en: Ancient Greece was a fountain of wisdom and philosophy.
sentences.cn: 古希腊是智慧和哲学的发源地。

jushi.english: The fountain plays only at weekend.
jushi.chinese: 这个喷泉仅在周末喷水。

jushi.english: The fountain is fed from the adjacent hill.
jushi.chinese: 这泉里的水来自邻近的那座小山。
